description: Unix philosophy at its finest lmao

I don't know why this exists as a standalone app, but it seems to work as intended and the app icon looks pretty GNOME HIG-ish... I'll offer a few UI suggestions. I would make the date entry field a counter with up/down arrows, and have this counter default to the current year. For an extra bit of "smartness", if "today's" date is after the event's date for the current year, then start the counter at next year's date. Typing in the year manually to use this calculator feels a bit clunky to me.
This program, in following with the tradition of Terry Davis, is doing great work for the Church. I highly recommend it!
